Html:
Hi there,

I'm trying to do hyperlink by using RTE. But problem is while saving the text as RTE.text it taking the hyperlink target as parent folder from where I call RTE and then my link what ever I set. I want to set the target as it. Please help me. This is urgent.

Hi,

I came across this problem as well. I did a text replace on the RTE.Text to specify a target for every hyperlink found. Simple but effective:

<font size="2">

RTE.Text.Replace(

</font>"<A href", "<A target=""_blank"" href").ToString
